plot: High school freshman Rihito, who just came back from abroad, started a new life in Japan with his four Busou Shinki, female action figures with weapons.
opening_theme: "Install x Dream" by Kana Asumi, Chihara Minori, Kaori Mizuhashi and Megumi Nakajima (eps 1-7, 12)
ending_theme: "Taiyō no Sign" (太陽のサイン) by Azusa (eps 1-12)
insert_song: "Futari no Yakusoku" (ふたりの約束) by Megumi Nakajima (ep 10)
"Kimi to Mirai e" (君と未来へ) by Kana Asumi, Chihara Minori, Kaori Mizuhashi and Megumi Nakajima (ep 5)
